alert.note: Alert for Garland; Lonoke; Prairie; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 4:15AM CST until January 15 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills as low as zero to 10 below zero this morning and again tonight and Tuesday morning. For the Winter Weather Advisory, additional light snow accumulations up to an inch are expected this morning. * WHERE...Parts of central Arkansas. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST Tuesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until noon CST today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...With Arctic air firmly in place, impacts from snowfall will last for several days, resulting in a prolonged period of hazardous travel conditions. Bitter cold wind chills could result in frostbite as well as significant impacts to infrastructure.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Be sure to check road conditions before traveling in these areas. Visit the Arkansas Department of Transportation`s website Idrivearkansas.com for the latest road and traffic conditions.
